<file path="/home/janreges/ai-distiller/testdata/java/03_medium/source.java">
package com.aidi.test.inheritance;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Optional;

interface DataStore<T> {
    void save(T item);
    Optional<T> findById(String id);
    List<T> findAll();
}

abstract class BaseStore<T> implements DataStore {
    @Override
    void save(T item);
    *abstract void log(T item);
}

class UserStore extends BaseStore {
    @Override
    Optional<User> findById(String id);
    @Override
    List<User> findAll();
    @Override
    @Auditable("USER_LOG")
    *void log(User item);
}

class User {
    -String name;
    User(String name);
    String getName();
    @Override
    String toString();
}
</file>
